alert.note: Alert for Darlington; Marlboro (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 4:19PM EDT until July 22 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Darlington County in northeastern South Carolina... Central Marlboro County in northeastern South Carolina... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 419 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Bennettsville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Bennettsville, Clio, Brownsville, Dunbar, Society Hill and Blenheim. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
